name: Jupymate MCP
description: Master Control Program configuration for Jupymate, defining Jupiter API interactions for AI-assisted development.

quote.description: Provides real-time swap rates and route plans from Jupiter's aggregator.

params.inputMint: The token mint address for the input token.
params.outputMint: The token mint address for the output token.
params.amount: The amount of input token to swap, in its smallest unit (lamports).
params.slippageBps: The allowed slippage in basis points (e.g., 50 for 0.5%).

quote.response: A quote object containing amounts, price impact, and potential routes.

swap.description: Generates an unsigned swap transaction based on a provided quote.

body.userPublicKey: The user's Solana wallet public key.
body.quoteResponse: The full response object from the Quote API.
body.wrapAndUnwrapSol: Boolean to automatically wrap/unwrap SOL if needed.

swap.response: A serialized, base64-encoded transaction string to be signed and sent.

swapInstructions.description: Fetches only the swap instruction objects for custom transaction composition.

body.userPublicKey: The user's Solana wallet public key.
body.quoteResponse: The full response object from the Quote API.

swapInstructions.response: An object containing setup, swap, and cleanup instructions.

programIds.description: Maps on-chain program IDs to their corresponding DEX or protocol labels.
programIds.response: A JSON object where keys are program IDs and values are human-readable labels.

security.shieldApi: Integrated via Jupiter's backend to validate token safety and prevent swaps with malicious or risky tokens.
